How does GoPro not become just kind of a fad?
I think we have an unfair advantage as far as consumer product company goes anyway...
...in that we're really building these products for ourselves.
GoPro has somewhat been a selfish company from the beginning.
It started with me wanting to capture photos of myself and my friends surfing.
And now that we're where we are now,...
...we're still just engineering products for ourselves.
Only, we're able to do so much more now than we ever were before.
